          <title>
            <string language="hu">Portré</string>
            <string language="en">Portrait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Portrait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verticale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ritratto</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Retrato</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az elegáns öltözetű uralkodó lováról leszállva tájháttér előtt</string>
            <string language="en">The well-groomed king dismounting in front of  a landscape</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Karoling,  Nagy Károly,  lovasszobor,   9.század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Carolingian, Charlemagne, equestrian statue, 9th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der gut-gepflegte König, der vor einer 
Landschaft ausgliedert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le roi bien-toiletté démontant devant un 
horizontal</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O rei bem-well-groomed que desmonta na frente de 
uma paisagem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il re bene-governato che si smonta davanti un

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο καλά-καλλωπισμένος βασιλιάς που κατεβαίνει μπροστά 
από ένα τοπίο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El rey bien-preparado que desmonta delante de un 
paisaje</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Carolingian, Karl der Große, Reiterstatue, 9. 
Jahrhundert</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
